languages.text: "Воды сего источника да исправят ошибки заблудших". {n}Кибелла прижимает ладонь к груди, неотрывно глядя на неспокойную гладь.{/n} "Сотрут неверные шаги, омоют оскверненные руки, очистят помутненный разум... Сойдя в воды да обретем силу, дабы следовать стезей".

traits.locale_text: "Воды сего источника да исправят ошибки плутавших". {n}Кибелла прижимает ладонь к груди, неотрывно глядя на неспокойную гладь перед собой.{/n} "Сотрут неверные шаги, омоют оскверненные руки, очистят помутненный разум... Сойдя в воды да обретем силу, дабы превозмочь стезю".

languages.text: "May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."
languages.original_text: "Воды сего источника да исправят ошибки заблудших". {n}Кибелла прижимает ладонь к груди, неотрывно глядя на неспокойную гладь.{/n} "Сотрут неверные шаги, омоют оскверненные руки, очистят помутненный разум... Сойдя в воды да обретем силу, дабы следовать стезей".

traits.locale_text: "May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... And as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our way."

"May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... And as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our way."

"May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our way."

"May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our way."

"May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."

"May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."

languages.text: «Que estas aguas reparen los errores de los perdidos». {n}Kibellah se lleva una mano al pecho mientras observa la superficie ondeante.{/n} «Que borren sus equivocaciones, limpien las manos mancilladas, despejen la mente obnubilada... y que, cuando nos sumerjamos en ellas, nos otorguen la fuerza que necesitamos para recorrer nuestro hilo».
languages.original_text: "May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."

traits.locale_text: «Que estas aguas reparen los errores de los perdidos». {n}Kibellah se lleva una mano al pecho mientras observa la superficie ondeante.{/n} «Que borren sus equivocaciones, limpien las manos mancilladas, despejen la mente obnubilada... y que, cuando nos sumerjamos en ellas, nos otorguen la fuerza que necesitamos para recorrer nuestro hilo».

languages.text: 「この水が、失われた者たちの過ちを繕いますように」{n}キベラは胸に手を当て、波打つ水面を見つめる。{/n}「間違いだらけの足跡を洗い流し、汚れた手を清め、曇った心を晴らしますように…そして私たちが進む時には、自分たちの糸を辿る力を与えてくれますように」
languages.original_text: "May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."

traits.locale_text: 「この水が、失われた者たちの過ちを繕いますように」{n}キベラは胸に手を当て、波打つ水面を見つめる。{/n}「間違いだらけの足跡を洗い流し、汚れた手を清め、曇った心を晴らしますように…そして私たちが進む時には、自分たちの糸を辿る力を与えてくれますように」

languages.text: “愿流水弥补迷失之人的过错。”{n}绮贝菈一只手按在胸前，凝视着水面上的涟漪。{/n}“愿它洗刷我的过失，洗净我肮脏的双手，洗涤我阴暗的心灵……当我们涉水前行时，愿它赐予我们力量，让我们在各自的丝线上稳步前行。”
languages.original_text: "May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."

traits.locale_text: “愿流水弥补迷失之人的过错。”{n}绮贝菈一只手按在胸前，凝视着水面上的涟漪。{/n}“愿它洗刷我的过失，洗净我肮脏的双手，洗涤我阴暗的心灵……当我们涉水前行时，愿它赐予我们力量，让我们在各自的丝线上稳步前行。”

languages.text: "Möge dieses Wasser die Fehler der Verlorenen korrigieren." {n}Kibellah presst eine Hand an ihre Brust und starrt auf die gekräuselte Oberfläche.{/n} "Möge es die Fehltritte wegwaschen, die schmutzigen Hände reinigen, den umwölkten Geist klären ... und wenn wir hineinwaten, möge es uns die Kraft gewähren, unserem Faden weiter zu folgen."
languages.original_text: "May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."

traits.locale_text: "Möge dieses Wasser die Fehler der Verlorenen korrigieren." {n}Kibellah presst eine Hand an ihre Brust und starrt auf die gekräuselte Oberfläche.{/n} "Möge es die Fehltritte wegwaschen, die schmutzigen Hände reinigen, den umwölkten Geist klären ... und wenn wir hineinwaten, möge es uns die Kraft gewähren, unserem Faden weiter zu folgen."

languages.text: « Puissent ces eaux réparer les erreurs des égarés. » {n}Kibellah porte une main à sa poitrine, le regard rivé sur la surface ondoyante.{/n} « Puissent-elles effacer les faux pas, purifier les mains souillées, clarifier l'esprit embrumé... et à l'heure où nous avançons à contre-courant, puissent-elles nous donner la force de suivre le fil qui est le nôtre. »
languages.original_text: "May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."

traits.locale_text: « Puissent ces eaux réparer les erreurs des égarés. » {n}Kibellah porte une main à sa poitrine, le regard rivé sur la surface ondoyante.{/n} « Puissent-elles effacer les faux pas, purifier les mains souillées, clarifier l'esprit embrumé... et à l'heure où nous avançons à contre-courant, puissent-elles nous donner la force de suivre le fil qui est le nôtre. »

languages.original_text: "May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."

languages.text: "Bu sular, kaybolanların hatalarını telafi etsin." {n}Kibellah, bir elini göğsüne bastırarak hafifçe dalgalanan yüzeye bakıyor.{/n} "Atılan yanlış adımları unuttursun, kirlenen elleri arındırsın, bulanan zihinleri aydınlatsın ve... İçinde attığımız her adımla bize ipliğimizin yolundan gidecek kuvveti bahşetsin."
languages.original_text: "May these waters mend the mistakes of the lost." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to her chest, staring at the rippling surface.{/n} "May they wash away the missteps, cleanse the soiled hands, clear the clouded mind... and as we wade in, may they grant us the strength to follow our thread."
